That&#8217;s the advice from the writer behind Anne, a new CBC TV series based on the beloved 1908 Anne of Green Gables novel by Prince Edward Island author Lucy Maud Montgomery.</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 20:49:06 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11915002.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="'Think of Anne as a real girl': Vancouver casting call for new Anne of Green Gables TV series" href="http://vancouversun.com/entertainment/television/new-anne-needs-to-keep-it-real" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11914373</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/celebrity/brit+picks+2016/11914373/story.html</link><title>Brit's Picks May 12 – 19, 2016</title><description>Paul Reddick&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; May 13&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Bassment You&#8217;ve seen him on the Jazz Festival stage here in Saskatoon and now blues musician Paul Reddick is back in our city. He&#8217;s one of the most popular blues and roots musicians today and is known for his blend of poetry and music. It&#8217;s a honking, harmonica loving good [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 12:00:39 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11914374.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Brit's Picks May 12 – 19, 2016" href="http://thestarphoenix.com/entertainment/local-arts/brits-picks-may-12-19-2016" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11912678</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/public+broadcasters+from+around+world+hear/11912678/story.html</link><title>Public broadcasters from around the world hear how Canada became a leader in Indigenous TV at INPUT conference</title><description>When Lisa Meeches was pregnant with her daughter she read some&#160;statistics&#160;gathered by the&#160;United Nations about Indigenous women. They revealed that by the time an indigenous woman came of age there was a high probability&#160;she would be murdered, abused or suffer from addiction issues. Her daughter had yet to be born, but the Ojibwe TV and [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 22:38:57 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11912680.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Public broadcasters from around the world hear how Canada became a leader in Indigenous TV at INPUT conference" href="http://calgaryherald.com/entertainment/television/public-broadcasters-from-around-the-world-hear-how-canada-became-a-leader-in-indigenous-tv-at-input-conference" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11912135</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/bingeing+bosch+series+available+cravetv+canada/11912135/story.html</link><title>Try bingeing on Bosch, a cop series now available on CraveTV in Canada</title><description>Bill Brownstein says: Countless TV cop shows over the years have captivated viewers, but this one goes to the head of the class &#8211; a result of superior character and plot development.</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 18:00:09 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11912136.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Try bingeing on Bosch, a cop series now available on CraveTV in Canada" href="http://montrealgazette.com/entertainment/television/bosch-a-cop-show-with-smarts-now-available-on-cravetv-in-canada" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11907318</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/calgary+executive+sous+chef+krish+nair+wins+2410/11907318/story.html</link><title>Calgary Zoo's executive sous chef Krish Nair wins $10,000 Chopped Canada episode</title><description>Using spring salmon, soda water and asparagus, among other ingredients, Calgary Zoo&#8217;s Krish Nair took home the $10,000 on Saturday&#8217;s episode of Food Canada&#8217;s Chopped Canada. Nair, who&#160;is executive sous chef of the Calgary Zoo, defeated three other chefs to take the prize. Each week four new chefs compete using mystery ingredients to make an [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Mon, 09 May 2016 21:04:26 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11907322.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Calgary Zoo's executive sous chef Krish Nair wins $10,000 Chopped Canada episode" href="http://calgaryherald.com/entertainment/television/calgary-zoos-executive-sous-chef-krish-nair-wins-10000-chopped-canada-episode" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11905129</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/courtney+paige+theroux+show+basically+entourage/11905129/story.html</link><title>Courtney Paige Theroux's new show: 'Basically Entourage meets 50 Shades of Grey'</title><description>&#8220;It's basically Entourage meets 50 Shades of Grey, but more appropriate for television,&#8221; she said. &#8220;It's a dream come true.&#8221;</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Sun, 08 May 2016 19:56:20 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11905130.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Courtney Paige Theroux's new show: 'Basically Entourage meets 50 Shades of Grey'" href="http://vancouversun.com/entertainment/television/dream-comes-true-for-kelowna-actress-courtney-paige-theroux" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11902187</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/business/real-estate/ready+real+realtors+vancouver/11902187/story.html</link><title>Are you ready for the Real Realtors of Vancouver?</title><description>A local production company appears to be launching a Chinese-language reality TV show this month that will take viewers behind the scenes of the Lower Mainland's booming housing market.</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 06 May 2016 22:07:28 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11902188.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Are you ready for the Real Realtors of Vancouver?" href="http://vancouversun.com/business/real-estate/new-reality-show-focuses-on-agents-selling-high-end-vancouver-real-estate" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11902331</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/russell+peters+films+netflix+special+takes+break/11902331/story.html</link><title>Russell Peters films Netflix special, takes break from touring</title><description>Question: What do you call a Mexican guy who has a toe made out of rubber? Answer: Roberto. It sounds like &#8220;rubber toe&#8221;, get it? Trust Russell Peters &#8212; that joke kills on the schoolyard. &#8220;That was one of my [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 06 May 2016 21:52:15 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11902332.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11901686</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/supergirl+about+land+vancouver/11901686/story.html</link><title>Is Supergirl about to land in Vancouver?</title><description>Vancouver&#8217;s comic book universe, which already includes Arrow, The Flash and DC&#8217;s Legends of Tomorrow, may be expanding with news that Supergirl may be heading this way.</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 06 May 2016 20:14:00 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11901687.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Is Supergirl about to land in Vancouver?" href="http://vancouversun.com/entertainment/television/hollywood-north-is-supergirl-about-to-land-in-vancouver" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11902042</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/input+bring+innovative+world+leaders+public/11902042/story.html</link><title>INPUT to bring innovative world leaders in public television to Calgary</title><description>There&#8217;s a puppet talk show from Japan, a Danish&#160;P.O.V. documentary about a 500-pound-plus chronic&#160;overeater and&#160;an&#160;Estonian reality series about disabled youth in&#160;a&#160;metal band. There will even be an&#160;international panel dedicated to attracting younger viewers that has been not-so-subtly named &#8220;Don&#8217;t You F&#8212;ing Bore Me.&#8221; It&#8217;s all part of the&#160;creative, irreverent, groundbreaking&#160;and&#160;occasionally strange world of public television [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 06 May 2016 19:52:50 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11902043.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="INPUT to bring innovative world leaders in public television to Calgary" href="http://calgaryherald.com/entertainment/television/input-to-bring-innovative-world-leaders-in-public-television-to-calgary" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11899268</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/news/local+news/video+donald+trump+responds+vilification+22trump+name/11899268/story.html</link><title>Video: Donald Trump Jr. responds to the vilification of the "Trump" name</title><description>Donald Trump Jr. was in Vancouver in preparation to the launch of Trump Tower and respond to his father&#8217;s presidential campaign.</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Thu, 05 May 2016 21:13:09 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11899270.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Video: Donald Trump Jr. responds to the vilification of the "Trump" name" href="http://vancouversun.com/news/local-news/video-donald-trump-jr-responds-to-the-vilification-of-the-trump-name" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11898346</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/books/brit+picks+2016/11898346/story.html</link><title>Brit's Picks: May 5-12, 2016</title><description>Hello from Hedley &#160; Vancouver based Hedley is out on a world tour promoting its new album Hello. This show is sure to be high energy and a great one to take your [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Thu, 05 May 2016 15:38:56 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11898347.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Brit's Picks: May 5-12, 2016" href="http://thestarphoenix.com/entertainment/local-arts/brits-picks-may-5-12-2016" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11882862</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/half+century+bridge+calgary+expo+actors+talk/11882862/story.html</link><title>Half a century on the bridge: Calgary Expo actors talk about the legacy of Star Trek</title><description>From the beginning,&#160;Connor Trinneer&#160;should have realized&#160;that entering the&#160;Star Trek universe would&#160;not&#160;be a casual affair. By the time the actor&#160;signed on to play chief engineer Charles (Trip) Tucker II in the 2001 prequel series Star Trek: Enterprise, the franchise had been&#160;deeply ingrained into&#160;our pop culture for decades. Trinneer, who&#160;up until that point had done most of [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 29 Apr 2016 17:15:05 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11882863.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Half a century on the bridge: Calgary Expo actors talk about the legacy of Star Trek" href="http://calgaryherald.com/entertainment/television/half-a-century-on-the-bridge-calgary-expo-actors-talk-about-the-legacy-of-star-trek" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11881563</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/agent+clark+gregg+last+minute+recruit+calgary/11881563/story.html</link><title>Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D's Clark Gregg a last-minute recruit for Calgary Expo</title><description>Just days after Adrianna Palicki cancelled her appearance at Calgary Expo, her Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. co-star Clark Gregg has stepped in. Gregg, who has also played Phil Coulson in Iron Man, Iron Man 2, Thor and Marvel&#8217;s The Avengers was announced on Wednesday, just one day before Expo&#8217;s four-day run at Stampede Park. He is [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 29 Apr 2016 17:15:10 Z</pubDate><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D's Clark Gregg a last-minute recruit for Calgary Expo" href="http://calgaryherald.com/entertainment/local-arts/agent-of-s-h-i-e-l-ds-clark-gregg-a-last-minute-recruit-for-calgary-expo" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11880562</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/magnotta+documentary+finally+airs+canada/11880562/story.html</link><title>Magnotta documentary finally airs in Canada</title><description>Sex, Fame & Murder tracks the killer's back story</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Wed, 27 Apr 2016 14:54:25 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11880563.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Magnotta documentary finally airs in Canada" href="http://montrealgazette.com/entertainment/television/luka-magnotta-documentary-finally-airs-in-canada" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11873620</guid><link>http://leaderpost.com/news/local-news/nothing-stops-bruce-bjorndahls-iconic-dr-who-cosplay</link><title>Nothing stops Bruce Bjorndahl's iconic Dr. Who cosplay</title><description>Bruce Bjorndahl knows he&#8217;ll be hurting after a day of cosplaying as The Doctor&#160;at Fan Expo Regina, and it&#8217;s totally worth it. &#8220;I walk into it fully knowing that I&#8217;m going to be walking out in pain later in the day. And like I said, that&#8217;s what drugs are for,&#8221; said Bjorndahl, who is originally [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Sun, 24 Apr 2016 23:37:50 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11873622.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Nothing stops Bruce Bjorndahl's iconic Dr. Who cosplay" href="http://leaderpost.com/news/local-news/nothing-stops-bruce-bjorndahls-iconic-dr-who-cosplay" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11871171</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/this+numbers+game+which+brother+canada+house/11871171/story.html</link><title>‘This isn’t a numbers game’: Which Big Brother Canada house guest was sent packing by a unanimous vote?</title><description>And evidently, still does not quite understand how the game is played, with a seat waiting for him/her at the jury house</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 22 Apr 2016 23:45:40 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11871172.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="‘This isn’t a numbers game’: Which Big Brother Canada house guest was sent packing by a unanimous vote?" href="http://news.nationalpost.com/arts/television/this-isnt-a-numbers-game-which-big-brother-canada-house-guest-was-sent-packing-by-a-unanimous-vote" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11871556</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/calgary+documentary+about+wolves+wins+humane/11871556/story.html</link><title>Calgary documentary about wolves wins Humane Society's Genesis Award</title><description>A Calgary&#160;TV documentary&#160;investigating Alberta&#8217;s management of wolves has picked up a prestigious international award from the Humane Society. Geordie Day&#8217;s Unnatural Enemies: The War on Wolves, which was produced by Pyramid Productions, aired last May on CTV and examined the province&#8217;s controversial use of wire snares, strychnine poisoning and bounty hunters to kill wolves. Earlier [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 22 Apr 2016 22:21:23 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11871557.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Calgary documentary about wolves wins Humane Society's Genesis Award" href="http://calgaryherald.com/entertainment/television/calgary-documentary-about-wolves-wins-humane-societys-genesis-award" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11871346</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/netflix+drops+tech+bomb+canadian+users/11871346/story.html</link><title>Netflix drops tech-bomb on Canadian VPN users</title><description>Netflix announced in January it would be employing new methods to stymie VPNs and other side-doors to the &#8220;geo-blocking&#8221; of programming.</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 22 Apr 2016 21:45:04 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11871347.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Netflix drops tech-bomb on Canadian VPN users" href="http://vancouversun.com/entertainment/television/netflix-drops-tech-bomb-on-canadian-vpn-users" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11871169</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/jimmy+fallon+starts+singing+fancy+french/11871169/story.html</link><title>Jimmy Fallon starts singing at fancy French restaurant in Vancouver</title><description>Tonight Show host Jimmy Fallon and his barber shop quartet, The Ragtime Gales, entertained diners at the Vancouver five-star restaurant Le Crocodile with a rendition of Ignition Thursday night.</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 22 Apr 2016 21:44:09 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11871170.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Jimmy Fallon starts singing at fancy French restaurant in Vancouver" href="http://vancouversun.com/entertainment/television/jimmy-fallon-starts-singing-at-fancy-french-restaurant-in-vancouver" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11871063</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/turn+washington+spies+costumer+shares+behind/11871063/story.html</link><title>Turn: Washington’s Spies’ costumer shares behind-the-seams secrets</title><description>They say one good turn deserves another, so it made sense that when it came time to order a third season of AMC&#8217;s period drama Turn: Washington&#8217;s Spies, the network&#8217;s bosses offered a mighty yea instead of nay. Based on [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Fri, 22 Apr 2016 17:20:02 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11871064.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11865784</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/reservoir+dogs+roth+christina+hendricks/11865784/story.html</link><title>Reservoir Dogs' Tim Roth, Mad Men's Christina Hendricks to star in Alberta-shot Tin Star</title><description>Academy Award-nominated actor Tim Roth and Mad Men&#8217;s Christina Hendricks are coming to Calgary to star in the series, Tin Star. Britain&#8217;s Sky Atlantic confirmed&#160;that the two will head the cast of the drama, which is scheduled to be shot in Calgary and Southern Alberta in late spring. British director and screenwriter Rowan Joffe created&#160;the [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Wed, 20 Apr 2016 21:22:48 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11865785.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Reservoir Dogs' Tim Roth, Mad Men's Christina Hendricks to star in Alberta-shot Tin Star" href="http://calgaryherald.com/entertainment/television/reservoir-dogs-tim-roth-mad-mens-christina-hendricks-reportedly-set-to-star-in-alberta-shot-tin-star" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11865458</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/must+show+giving+game+thrones+once/11865458/story.html</link><title>Must the show go on? Why I’m giving up on Game of Thrones, once and for all</title><description>'I&#8217;m generally a TV completist, but the return on investment on Game of Thrones has been decreasing steadily'</description><source>Entertainment - TV</source><pubDate>Wed, 20 Apr 2016 19:15:53 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11865459.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Must the show go on? Why I’m giving up on Game of Thrones, once and for all" href="http://news.nationalpost.com/arts/television/must-the-show-go-on-why-im-giving-up-on-game-of-thrones-once-and-for-all" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11862220</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/television/ginger+snaps+fear+over+teen+violence+almost/11862220/story.html</link><title>Ginger Snaps: How fear over teen violence almost killed John Fawcett's werewolf cult classic</title><description>It has been more than 16 years since it happened, but John Fawcett still sounds bewildered, and a little&#160;annoyed, about the strange forces that nearly derailed his werewolf film back in 1999. Producing an&#160;independent horror movie&#160;in Canada is an uphill battle at the best of times.
